meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall, Dallas, Texas

agenda_items.title: Approval of Minutes of the October 23, 2024 City Council Meeting
Authorize acceptance of a grant from the U.S. Department of Justice
agenda_items.description: Acceptance of a grant for the BJA FY24 Veterans Treatment Court Discretionary Grant Program in the amount of $999,745.00.

agenda_items.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 3
agenda_items.description: To provide additional legal services related to the enforcement of the Hensley Field settlement agreement.

agenda_items.title: An ordinance authorizing the issuance and sale of City of Dallas General Obligation Refunding and Improvement Bonds
agenda_items.description: Issuance and sale of bonds in an aggregate principal amount not to exceed $353,000,000.00.

agenda_items.title: Authorize a five-year sole source services agreement
agenda_items.description: For online investigative solutions and criminal activity database services for the Dallas Police Department.

financial_items.description: Grant from the U.S. Department of Justice for Veterans Treatment Court
Issuance of General Obligation Refunding and Improvement Bonds
Sole source services agreement for investigative solutions
